name: 11x11: New Season
description:
Meet the new season of 11x11!

It has never been this enjoyable to be a football team manager - amazing graphics in 3D, modern and convenient interface, unforgettable matches!

We have kept everything that you have come to love the old version for - build your own city, buy football players on the transfer, train them and increase the level of your team. However, we haven’t forgotten to introduce new features: collect contracts, hire rare players, acquire the richest sponsors and lead your team into the best league.
